scripts.build: npm run shadcn:clean && npm run shadcn:generate && npm run shadcn:tsc && npm run shadcn:move
scripts.shadcn:tsc: npm run shadcn:tsc:preinstall && tsc -p tsconfig.json && node ./types.mjs
scripts.shadcn:tsc:preinstall: npm install -D tailwindcss-animate class-variance-authority clsx tailwind-merge lucide-react
